description: Functions for working with wall facets (triangular faces)

functions.name: find
functions.description: Get the facet object with the given ID number.

returns.description: Facet object with the specified ID, or None if not found

functions.name: inbox
functions.signature: itasca.wall.facet.inbox(lower_bound: vec, upper_bound: vec, boundary: bool = False) -> tuple of Facet
functions.description: Get facets with extents intersecting a box. If boundary is True, only return facets inside the extent.

parameters.name: lower_bound
parameters.description: Lower bound of the bounding box

parameters.name: upper_bound
parameters.description: Upper bound of the bounding box

parameters.name: boundary
parameters.description: If True, only return facets inside the extent

returns.description: Tuple of Facet objects within the specified box

functions.name: list
functions.description: Get a wall facet iterator object.

functions.name: near
functions.description: Find the closest facet to a point.

returns.description: Closest Facet object to the specified point
